_header: This water this lion dragon also dreaden me so sore
_description: Two couplets in a Latin exemplum

BLHar7322.Transcription:
þis water þis lyonn þis dragoun also drede me so
                    soreÞat ich ne wot what to do bote cleopen crist þyn oreffor
                    sac withstond and tred wit maynAnd tak þis gerlaund oþer þou
                    list slayn
BLHar7322.Note:
Written as prose.Lines alternate rubric with brown text
                    ink.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.352.
